"Underworks Probe":
"Your task is to explore the mining tunnels
known as the Underworks in the depths
of Lilipur.

You are free to search the Underworks at will.



----------------------------------------
You will fail if you lose the final battle."

"惑星リリーパの地底に存在する

地下坑道を各位、自由に探索せよ。
